DESCRIPTION:
Test that an admin user can view all videos uploaded to the CMS platform.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Video section
4. Verify all video columns are displayed correctly
5. Verify videos list is accessible
NAME: test_NAF_8_2_0_View_All_Videos_Uploaded

DESCRIPTION:
Test that an admin user can pin and unpin selected posts.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Postpartum community page
4. Create a new post with image
5. Publish the post and verify creation
6. Pin the post
7. Unpin the post
8. Verify pin/unpin functionality works correctly
NAME: test_1260_pin_unpin_community_post

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case: NAF-93, NAF-96, NAF-97
    As a user on the home page I should be able to see the list of recommended programs
    Scenario: View list of recommended programs
    Steps:
NAME: test_view_recommended_programs

DESCRIPTION:
Test that an admin can delete and edit own posts, replies and posts/replies created by others.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Postpartum community page
4. Create a new post with image
5. Publish the post and verify creation
6. Edit the post with new content
7. Add a comment to the post
8. Delete the comment
9. Delete the post
NAME: test_1240_delete_edit_own_and_others_post

DESCRIPTION:
Test that a user with admin role can successfully log out from the CMS.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Go to the login page
3. Enter the admin credentials
4. Click the login button
5. Verify that the user is logged in
6. Click the logout button
7. Verify that the user is logged out
NAME: test_NAF_7_3_0_Logout_of_AdminPanel

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case 214: Verify ability to delete comment from comment/question thread.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Notifications page
4. Check for unread notifications
5. If no unread notifications, switch to Read tab
6. Open the first comment thread
7. Delete comment in thread
8. Verify comment is deleted successfully
NAME: test_CMS_214_Delete_From_Comment_Thread

DESCRIPTION:
Test that an admin user can select a video and update its details.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Video section
4. Upload a new video with random title
5. Select the uploaded video
6. Update video details
7. Verify changes are saved successfully
NAME: test_NAF_8_8_0_Update_Video_Details

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case: NAF-12
    As a user during onboarding, I should be able to start one of the recommended programs right from the onboarding
    Scenario: Successful Login 
                         
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Click on first recommended program
    3. Verify "Start Program" button is displayed
    4. Click on "Start Program" button
    5. Finish first day of the program
NAME: test_join_program

DESCRIPTION:
Test that an admin user can create and edit programs.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Programs section
4. Create a new program with random title
5. Wait for page to load after program creation
6. Edit the created program
7. Verify changes are saved successfully
NAME: test_NAF_980_Edit_Program

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case: NAF-40
    As a registered user I can view and update profile image
    Scenario: Edit Profile Picture
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to "My Profile" button
    3. Click on "Edit" button
    4. Click on "Take a picture" button
    5. Select a photo from the device
NAME: test_NAF_3_3_0_edit_profile_picture

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case: NAF-55
    As a registered user I can view and update my profile settings

    2. Go to "My Profile" button
    3. Click on "Edit" button
    4. Enter name
    5. Click on "Save" button
NAME: test_NAF_3_4_0_modify_name

DESCRIPTION:
Test that an admin can view all communities from the CMS.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Postpartum community page
4. Verify visibility of all community groups
5. Check each community individually (Pregnant, Trying to Conceive, Postpartum)
NAME: test_1210_View_All_Communities

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case 212: Verify ability to close comments view.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Notifications page
4. Check for unread notifications
5. If no unread notifications, switch to Read tab
6. Click on the first notification entry
7. Close the comments view using Escape key
8. Verify comments view is closed successfully
NAME: test_CMS_212_Close_Comments_View

DESCRIPTION:
Test that an admin user can upload a new video to the platform with unpublished status.

4. Upload a new video with random title
5. Verify video is uploaded with unpublished status
6. Verify video appears in the videos list

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case: NAF-14
    As a user, I want to log in with my email and password
    Scenario: Login Unsuccessful due to Incorrect Password
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app
    2. Click on "Log in" button
    3. Click on "Sign in with your email" button
    4. Enter valid email: qingqin@topflightapps.com
    5. Enter incorrect password: Aa1234567
    6. Click "Log in" button
    7. Verify error message appears
    
    Expected Result: Error message "The password you entered is incorrect" should be displayed
NAME: test_NAF_2_2_0_login_with_wrong_password

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case: NAF-15
    As a user, I want to log in with my email and password
    Scenario: Login Unsuccessful due to Non-existent Email
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app
    2. Click on "Log in" button
    3. Click on "Sign in with your email" button
    4. Enter non-existent email: test@example.com
    5. Enter password: testpassword
    6. Click "Log in" button
    7. Verify error message appears
    
    Expected Result: Error message "There is no account associated with this email. Please sign up." should be displayed
NAME: test_NAF_2_2_0_login_with_wrong_email

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case: NAF-37, NAF-39
    As a registered user I can view and update my bio

    2. Go to "My Profile" button
    3. Click on "Edit" button
    4. Enter bio content
    5. Click on "Save" button
    6. Verify bio content is updated
    
    Expected Result: Bio content is updated
